headline: State funding granted to Mahoning County projects
author: Katelyn Amato
sentences: The project will help replace the 64 pneumatic controlled shower doors at the Ohio State Penitentiary in Youngstown.
The Department of Rehabilitation and Correction will receive $710,000 for its Shower Door Replacement Project.
(WKBN) – On Monday, State Representative Al Cutrona announced funding for two projects in Mahoning County.
The state’s Controlling Board is giving $265,000 to Eastern Gateway Community College.
The money will be used to buy equipment for the workforce training programs.
